A '''skull charge banner pattern''' is a [[banner pattern]] used to customize [[banner]]s with a shape of a [[skull]] with crossbones.

== Obtaining ==
=== Crafting ===
{{Crafting
|Paper
|Wither Skeleton Skull
|Output=Skull Charge Banner Pattern
|type=Miscellaneous
}}

== Usage ==
=== Loom ingredient ===
Skull charge banner patterns are used in [[loom]]s to add customization to [[banner]]s. The pattern must be combined with 1 banner and 1 [[dye]]. Upon usage in the loom, the skull charge banner pattern is not consumed.

{{Looming
|showdescription=1
|ingredients={{:Banner/recipe|ingredients}}
|{{:Banner/recipe|banner}}
|Matching Dye
|Skull Charge Banner Pattern
|Skull Charge
|{{:Banner/recipe|output|Skull Charge}}
|Blink=Banner
|Olink=Banner
|description=Emblazons a skull charge (skull and crossbones)
}}
